alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 19 at 3:42AM EST until November 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Erie and Genesee counties. Lake effect snow across the Buffalo metro area early this morning will move north of the area this afternoon before moving back south across the area tonight into Sunday morning. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4307 7838 4319 7851 4322 7883 4316 7908 4300 7905 4288 7889 4281 7890 4288 7868 4292 7864 4299 7839 TIME Y22M11D19T0600Z-Y22M11D19T1500Z COORD...4317 7848 4328 7852 4335 7875 4329 7884 4326 7906 4307 7909 4288 7889 4283 7889 4288 7847 4298 7830 TIME Y22M11D19T1500Z-Y22M11D20T0300Z COORD...4249 7850 4296 7840 4301 7845 4290 7888 4279 7893 4232 7975 4199 7977 4202 7931 4208 7906 4230 7859 TIME Y22M11D20T0300Z-Y22M11D20T1200Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
